content: the sock is bound off using jeny s surprisingly stretchy bind off method **gauge** *for size a* 14 sts & 22 row = 4 / 10 cm in st st on us 10 5 6 5 mm worked in the round measured once dry after washing and blocking *for size b* 13 sts & 16 row = 4 / 10 cm in st st on us 11 8 mm worked in the round measured once dry after washing and blocking *for size c* 12 sts & 16 row = 4 / 10 cm in st st on us 13 9 mm worked in the round measured once dry after washing and blocking #squishhousesocks 1 https //fibrespace com/event/nyd-co-2026/
